txt.en: 'My father's library is ahead! Hurry, before the goblins arrive!'
You found the book sought by Dorset Oakes!
Too late! Battle-hardened goblin-champions have arrived, and you must retreat
Dorset Oakes has shown you into the cave that once served as his father's library.
'You found it, [placeholder]! I can hardly believe it! Quickly, now -- are you ready to leave?'

This cave was once the library of the great Benton Oakes, and its main room is full of book-shelves.\n\nDorset Oakes is waiting for you to find the book-shelf that contains \qOn the Hardiness of Animals in the Wilderness\q.
'Let's get out of here before the goblins make things even more difficult!'
Dorset Oakes is at the entrance of the cave.\n\nDorset is waiting for you to return with the book he asked for.
'Somewhere within that library is the book I'm seeking, [placeholder]. I hope you know which book-shelf it can be found on, for the goblins are sure to come poking around before too long!'
Find the book-shelf containing the book Dorset Oakes is seeking before the Goblin-champions arrive
You have found the book sought by Dorset Oakes!
